accept-terms-required: You must accept the Terms and Conditions.
reset-password-desc: Please enter your email address. You will receive a link to create a new password via email.
home-subtitle: A great platform to buy, sell, and rent your properties without any agent or commissions.
about-description-1: Eastleigh Real Estate has developed a platform for the Real Estate marketplace that allows buyers and sellers to easily execute a transaction on their own. The platform drives efficiency, cost transparency and control into the hands of the consumers. Eastleigh Real Estate is Real Estate Redefined.
feature-subtitle: A great plateform to buy, sell and rent your properties without any agent or commisions.
have-a-question: Have a question? Get in touch!
subscribe-subtitle: Subscribe to get latest updates and information.
pre-approval-letter-desc: Most buyers think the first step is finding their dream house, but the truth is finding the funding is the first step. Eastleigh Real Estate streamlines the Loan Pre-Approval process with our ecosystem of Premier Partners or simply upload your own Pre-Approval letter.
schedule-a-showing-desc: Eastleigh Real Estate allows a buyer to schedule an instant showing and gain a private viewing without the need for multiple parties to be involved. You pick the time that works for you!
submit-an-offer-desc: Eastleigh Real Estate a buyer through the purchase agreement process making the paperwork appear effortless. With our custom workflows and progress analytics, you will always know where your purchase stands. No more phone tag and unreturned emails!
property-inspection-desc: No one wants to buy a lemon. Book an inspection with a licensed inspector, then submit the repair requests all via the Eastleigh Real Estate platform.
appraisal-desc: Eastleigh Real Estate monitors the appraisal process ensuring the home you are purchasing meets or exceeds the price you are paying.
closing-deal-desc: Finally the closing packet is sent to the Title office, and the day has comeâ€¦ You have Eastleigh Real Estate the home of your dreams!
